songs.title: Downtown
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I always try to blow your mind, to blow your mind
Every single day and every single night
I give you yours, I give it and it's all the time
Why don't you give me mine?
Yeah, won't you give me mine?
I want a little lovin' in the wild west
You use your mouth for talking, boy, I'm not impressed
I got a lot of naughty in me and two breasts
Baby, are you blind? Why won't you give me mine?

[Chorus]
Downtown, yeah you know the place, oh
Goin' downtown, goin' downtown
Downtown, put a smile on my face, oh
Goin' downtown, goin' downtown
Downtown, whoa, downtown
You know what I'm talkin' 'bout
Downtown, whoa, see into my heart
When you're goin' downtown
